about_the_game:
Explore the Untold Story of the south american Tahuantinsuyo

Quipu Runner: Warmi’s Legacy is a groundbreaking action-adventure game that immerses players in the awe-inspiring world of the Incan Empire. Set in 1471 C.E., you step into the shoes of Warmi, a courageous survivor of a secret society dedicated to safeguarding the empire’s ancient wisdom. Following the death of Emperor Pachacuteq and a devastating betrayal, Warmi embarks on a harrowing quest for survival, vengeance, and self-discovery.

As the first AAA game inspired by the Incas, Quipu Runner: Warmi’s Legacy invites players to explore the vibrant landscapes and rich history of South America’s ancient civilizations. With breathtaking visuals, intricate gameplay, and a compelling narrative, this epic adventure delivers an experience that is as unforgettable as it is historically profound..

Wishlist Now and Join Warmi’s Fight for the untold Truth!

Key Features:

🌄 Authentic Historical Setting

Experience a richly detailed world inspired by the Tahuantinsuyo landscape, from vibrant cities to sacred buildings and treacherous mountain passes.

🧩 Puzzles and Mysteries

Harness the power of the Quipu, an ancient information system of knotted strings. Decode its secrets to unveil hidden messages, uncover lost technologies, and unlock pathways to ancient, forgotten knowledge.

⚔️ Dynamic Combat and Parkour

Master fast-paced combat with traditional weapons, and navigate the environment with fluid parkour-inspired movement, climbing, and exploration.

🎭 A Tale of Legacy and Identity

Immerse yourself in Warmi’s story as she battles inner demons, faces betrayal, and discovers the strength to shape her destiny.

🌌 Mythology Meets Reality

Encounter legendary figures and mythical creatures inspired by the rich tapestry of local lore, as Warmi’s journey weaves seamlessly between the realms of history and myth.

content_descriptors.notes:
Quipu Runner: Warmi's Legacy contains depictions of violence and mild nudity as part of its mature narrative and historical themes. Players will encounter scenes portraying combat, death, and intense emotional moments, reflecting the realities of the Inca civilization and its struggles. Nudity is presented in a non-sexualized and culturally respectful manner, staying true to the historical and artistic inspirations of the era.

This content is intended to immerse players in an authentic and dramatic story, but it may not be suitable for all audiences. Viewer discretion is advised.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Ventura
  • Processor: Chip M4
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Raytrace Compatible GPU
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

name: Quipu Runner: Warmi's Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: Quipu Runner: Warmi’s Legacy is an AAA game set in 1471 C.E., inspired by ancient South American civilizations. Join Warmi, a skilled Quipu Runner, on a journey of vengeance and discovery through the Tahuantinsuyo. Master parkour, combat, and the secrets of the quipu system in this epic adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America*, Quechua*
*languages with full audio support
